```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"

```

```{r setup}
library(alohakz)
library(tidyverse)
```

## Make a subset of cutthroats only

```{r}
cutthroat <- alohakz::and_vertebrates %>% 
  filter(SPECIES == "ONCL")
```

## Make a cool graph

```{r}
ggplot(data = cutthroat, aes(x = LENGTH1, y = WEIGHT)) +
  geom_point()
```
